name: Geo Map SS4U
author: Soft Solutions4U

sections.description:
• The ‘radius’ is selected using the drop-down. The maximum radius is fixed according to the backend settings.

Key features of Geo Map SS4U

  • Search nearby places – The ‘radius’ is selected using the drop-down. The maximum radius is fixed according to the backend settings.
  • Pagination – On clicking the ‘more’ link in the search, the additional results are added with the current result list

General settings

  • The map location is initialized with the boundary values [ East, West, North, South ].
  • The Maximum radius has to be provided in the backend settings.

Widgets

  • Search form widget to display any search from in the sidebar.
sections.installation:
Automatic Plugin Installation. To add a WordPress Plugin using the built-in plugin installer:

  • Go to Plugins > Add New.
  • Under Search, type “Geo Map Ss4u”.
  • Geo Map SS4U should show up on top of the results.
  • Click “Install” to install Geo Map Ss4u.
  • A pop-up window will ask you to confirm your wish to install the Plugin.
  • Click Proceed to continue with the installation. The resulting installation screen will list the installation as successful or note any problems during the install.
  • If successful, click Activate Plugin to activate it.

Manual plugin Installation. To install a WordPress plugin manually:

  • Download Geo Map Ss4u Plugin to your desktop.
  • The plugin will downloaded as a zip. extract the Plugin folder to your desktop.
  • With your FTP program, upload the Plugin folder to the wp-content/plugins folder in your WordPress directory online.
  • Go to Plugins screen and find the newly uploaded Plugin in the list.
  • Click Activate Plugin to activate it.
sections.faq:
Q Can we change the limits of the radius
A Yes you can change in the backend settings

Q Do you provide support
A. Yes we do. Please contact info@softsolutions4u.com.

short_description: Using Google's API tools GEO Map WP provides an advance proximity search for given types of Location on a given address and radius.
